root.select: select table_name from user_tables order by table_name

select columnTable.COLUMN_ID id,columnTable.COLUMN_NAME name,columnTable.DATA_TYPE type,columnTable.DATA_LENGTH numlength, columnTable.DATA_PRECISION precison,columnTable.NULLABLE nullable,columnTable.CHAR_LENGTH charlength, columnTable.DATA_DEFAULT defaultVal,commentTable.comments from user_tab_columns columnTable left join user_col_comments commentTable on commentTable.table_name=columnTable.table_name and commentTable.column_name=columnTable.column_name where columnTable.table_name = upper('TABLE_NAME') order by columnTable.column_id
select col.column_name from user_constraints con,user_cons_columns col where con.constraint_name=col.constraint_name and con.constraint_type='P' and col.table_name='TABLE_NAME'
select comments from user_tab_comments where table_name = 'TABLE_NAME'
